title: Creating Creative Tools
preview: Thoughts on why creative thinking and data both add layers of complexity that make Alan Kay's ideal of "symmetric authoring and consuming" incredibly difficult for software to support in practice.

preview.content: A guide for flashing CyanogenMod to an LG e980

title: The Future of Data Wrangling Tools
preview: An attempt to communicate the (almost completely) unexplored space of possible data wrangling tools, in terms of both non-tabular abstractions, as well as the pros and cons of fine-grained editors versus broad-strokes wrangling tools.
